name: readmoo-marathon-bot
description: Readmoo bot for marathons - for education purpose only

scripts.setup: cp config.template.yml config.yml && npm i && npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:containers: cat books.txt | xargs -I book bash -c '{ docker run -d --rm vansteki/readmoo-bot:latest -b book; sleep 10; }'
scripts.start:all: cat books.txt | xargs -P 10 -I book node app -b book

author: vance
